data.text: @spencedogyoi @licentian Yeah, man. Same. Hang in there. Exercise, reading dystopian fiction (to remember you’re the good guy in all this) and playing an instrument(s) has kept me sane. And turning off the news and just hanging with family.

@SteeleDaddy @licentian These last couple of years have been terrible for my mental health, it felt like I was going insane/schizo trying to fight against all the bullshit..I guess broken people see the world for how it is..sorta sucks seeing this country going down the shitter..

@SteeleDaddy Always knew people blindly obey leaders/media, but to push back and have it thrown in my face again and again to the point of psychological torture where I have no idea what's real anymore is maddening. Feel like I lost years of my life to what they unnecessarily put us through.
@SteeleDaddy This is the current reality https://t.co/JaQ6FizuKs
@SteeleDaddy I was blackpilled before covid but in the last 6 months I've seen so many major influencers wake up and spread awareness. I try to find those white pills daily to hold on and stay strong
@SteeleDaddy The thing that gets me is how many people just want to forget about it and return to the same exact places that caused all the strife.
@SteeleDaddy You have to build parallel structures with like minded people so you don't have to interact with those people. Or to rely on them as customers/clients.
